content.p: Our dedicated IT Service Desk is available to help with all your IT needs. During the university closure period, non-urgent issues can continue to be reported via the Self Service Portal. Requests logged through here will be assessed as quickly as possible when the core IT Service Desk team returns to work after 2 January 2025. For items of an urgent nature, please call 0115 95 16677 where the out of hours Service Desk function can offer help and escalation for a limited number of systems issues. Call on 0115 95 16677 to log a support call Open Monday - Friday, 8am - 5pm (excluding UK public holidays and university closure days) An out-of-hours telephone service is provided at all other times via 0115 95 16677 For the latest IT service and maintenance updates, check the status of IT services here: When responding to your call, the IT Service Desk may ask that you download 'TeamViewer QuickSupport' for remote support. Download Team Viewer QuickSupport
